justification: The fields related to metrics and configuration (metricsGrpcExporterTarget, metricsGrpcExporterHeader, metricGrpcExporterTimeOutInMills, metricGrpcExporterIntervalInMills, metricLoggingExporterIntervalInMills, metricsPromExporterPort, metricsPromExporterHost, metricsLabel, metricsInDelta, channelExpiredTimeout) are duplicated across different configuration classes (BrokerConfig and ProxyConfig). This indicates that these settings are part of a cross-cutting concern that affects multiple components, leading to potential inconsistencies and making it harder to maintain and understand the codebase.
